intro: Renealmia usneoides, commonly known as the spider plant, is a member of the Asparagaceae family. It is a herbaceous perennial plant that typically grows in moist, shaded environments. The plant features long, arching stems with small, lance-shaped leaves that are often covered in a fine, silvery down. It produces small, greenish-white flowers that are clustered in loose inflorescences. Renealmia usneoides is popular as a houseplant due to its ease of care and attractive appearance.
